desc: Press a key to move the hole to that key's position.
Press 3/6 to move up/down, and 7/8 to move left/right.
Press any key to advance title, Press 5 to drop bomb.
Press 4/6 to move left/right.
Press 4/6 to move left/right.
Press 4/6 to move column selector, Press 5 to drop a disc.
Think of a number from 0 through 63. Press 5 if you see the number on screen, press any other key if not.
Press any key to advance title, move selector with 2/4/6/8 and select with 5.
Press 5 to advance title, press 4/6 to move left/right, and 5 to shoot.
Press 2/4/6/8 to create a pattern. Press 0 when finished to generate kaleidoscope.
Select square by pressing 5/6/8/9.
Press 8 to shoot.
Press 1/4 to move left paddle up/down, Press C/D to move right paddle up/down.
Press 1/4 to move left paddle up/down, Press C/D to move right paddle up/down.
Press 2/4/6/8 to move hole.
Press 1/4 to move paddle up/down. Press any key to restart after losing.
Press F to advance title. Press 3/6 to move up/down, and 7/8 to move left/right. Press B to restart after losing.
Move with 2/4/6/8, shoot by pressing 5.
Press 5/6 to move piece left/right, press 4 to rotate, and press 7 to move down fast.
Press 1/2/3/4/5/6/7/8/9 to choose location.
Press 4/5/6 to shoot left/up/right.
Press 7 to advance title, press 1/4 to move paddle up/down, press any key to restart after losing.
Press 1/7/A to control the first player, press C/D/F to control the second player.
Press 1/4 to move paddle up/down. Press any key to restart after losing.
Press 4/6 to move left/right. Press any key to restart after losing.
